entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
